title: Data service Schema
description: A JSON schema for a data service file in the data catalog.

schema:image.title: Image URL
schema:image.description: URL for an image to be displayed in the data catalog. Choose an image that is related to the datasets content.

dct:identifier.title: Data service identifier
dct:identifier.description: Identifier for this data service. If left empty, it will be automatically assigned.

dct:title.title: Data service title
dct:title.description: Title for the data service in multiple languages.

dct:description.title: Data service description
dct:description.description: Description for the series in multiple languages.

dct:publisher.title: Publisher
dct:publisher.description: Federal Office responsible for the data object

dcat:contactPoint.title: Contact point
dcat:contactPoint.description: Contact information for potential inquiries about the data service.

dct:accessRights.title: Access rights
dct:accessRights.description: Defines the accessibility of the dataset (e.g., public, internal, etc.). You can find more information here: DCAT-AP CH 3.0 – Access Rights Vocabulary.

dcat:endpointURL.title: Endpoint URL
dcat:endpointURL.description: URL of the technical endpoint of the data service.

dcat:landingPage.title: Landing page
dcat:landingPage.description: Landing page or homepage for the API.

adms:status.title: Status
adms:status.description: Current status of the data service.

dcat:servesDataset.title: Serves dataset
dcat:servesDataset.description: IDs of the datasets served by this data service

dcat:endpointDescription.title: Endpoint description
dcat:endpointDescription.description: URL of technical documentation of the data service, such as for example a Swagger documentation.

foaf:page.title: Related resources
foaf:page.description: Any related page, document or resource.

alias.title: Page alias
alias.description: Alias to be showed in the interface for this link.

uri.title: url
uri.description: URL for the page, document or resource

schema:comment.title: Comments
schema:comment.description: Additional comments about the data service.

dcat:version.title: Service Version
dcat:version.description: The version indicator following a Major.Minor.Patch schema (example: 2.1.4).

adms:versionNotes.title: Version notes
adms:versionNotes.description: A description of the differences between this version and a previous version of the Dataset.

dct:conformsTo.title: Conforms to
dct:conformsTo.description: Reference to a standard or specification the Service conforms to.

dcatap:applicableLegislation.title: Applicable legislation
dcatap:applicableLegislation.description: The legislation that mandates or allows the creation or management of the data service.

bv:externalCatalogs.title: External catalogs
bv:externalCatalogs.description: External catalogs where the data object is published

dcat:catalog.title: Reference to external catalog
dcat:catalog.description: Reference to the external catalogs the data object should be pubished to. Adding a catalog here triggers metadata validation and an automatic push to the listed catalog.

dct:identifier.title: ID in the external catalog
dct:identifier.description: This field should be automatically filled at first publication with the ID assigned by the external catalog. It is a hidden field in the edit form.
